articles.author: Sam Jones
articles.title: Swiss prosecutor opens probe into Credit Suisse takeover - Financial Times
articles.description: Investigation will examine potential breaches of criminal law by officials, regulators and bank executives
articles.content:
Switzerlands Federal Prosecutor has opened an investigation into the state-backed takeover of Credit Suisse by its larger rival UBS.
The Bern-based prosecutor is looking into potential breaches of S… [+3092 chars]
